titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to allow employees in classified positions in community colleges to serve in certified or other academic capacities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/9/1997--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that community college employees in classified positions are not required to receive overtime compensation for additional service, on their own volition, in a certified or other academic capacity, unless they are employed in such positions for more than 40 hours in a week.
